title: proplem with legacy client
body:
hey , today i got poroplem with the legacy client 
there was an update i updated it i got proplem with zlip.dll file  i fixed it but now when i press double click on the client nothing happends please i want souloution{{champion:32}} {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Something's not right if you're still on the legacy client.  It's really important to get you updated to the updated version to resolve any of these issues.  Generally, the launcher not opening is caused by a security setting preventing it from opening.  I recommend a PC restart just in case it crashed, then to run through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access.

Once complete, my suggestion would be to download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a clean reinstall.  I hope that helps!
